code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function OrderForm(){const[user,setUser]=useState("");const[item,setItem]=useState("");const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);setMessage("");try{await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/orders",{name:user,item:item});setMessage("✅ Order created successfully!");setUser("");setItem("");}catch(err){setMessage("❌ Failed to create order. Try again.");}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{textAlign:"center"},children:"Create a New Order"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:user,onChange:e=>setUser(e.target.value),placeholder:"User name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:item,onChange:e=>setItem(e.target.value),placeholder:"Item name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:loading,children:loading?"Creating...":"Create Order"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"message ".concat(message.includes("✅")?"success":"error"),children:message})]});}export default OrderForm;
